verse: रे चित्त चिन्तय चिरं चरणौ मुरारेः पारं गमिष्यसि यतो भवसागरस्य । पुत्राः कलत्र मितरे न हि ते सहायाः सर्वं विलोकय सखे मृगतृष्णिकाभम्

words.भवसागरस्य: ocean of material existence(bound in time-space)

meaning: Oh mind think about the eternal feet of Murari that will help you cross the ocean of material existence, indeed the sons, wife and friends will not be helpful(when facing death), Look everywhere my friend, you will only find misery that people regard as happiness, just like how deer runs after dust particle in dessert regarding it as water.
